meanings.definition: The quality or state of being pleasant or attractive in appearance or manner.
meanings.sent1: Her personablenesses always make everyone feel welcome.
meanings.sent2: His personablenesses shine through in every interaction.
meanings.sent3: The party was a hit thanks to her personablenesses.
meanings.sent4: Her personablenesses were like a warm ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The puppy's personablenesses were irresistible to everyone who met him.

meanings.definition: The ability to make a positive impression on others.
meanings.sent1: His personablenesses helped him make friends easily.
meanings.sent2: She exudes personablenesses that draw people towards her.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's personablenesses had the audience laughing all night.
meanings.sent4: His personablenesses were a magnet for success in his career.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's personablenesses inspired her students to excel.
